title: Wikipedia - Arab Spring
description:
"The Arab Spring is a term for the revolutionary wave of demonstrations and protests (both non-violent and violent), riots, and civil wars in the Arab world that began on 18 December 2010."

Wikipedia Arab Spring ebook. Selected articles from Wikipedia related to the Arab Spring in .epub format. 

This book is part of the radical seed collection (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9389639/Op_Radical_Seed).
